name: AAWI-SmartHome
0:
”"Alexa, turn on bedroom light"”
”"Alexa, turn off bedroom light"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Instructions:
upon successful account linking, discover devices to find the smart home devices associated with your account.

You can turn on the appliances by saying "Alexa, Turn on 'appliance name' " and you can turn off the appliances by saying "Alexa, Turn off 'appliance name' " 

Note: The email ID associated with the smart home devices in the AAWI app must be only used for account linking.
